amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule of the Federal Highway Administration relating to greenhouse gas emissions performance measures.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1241 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1241 proposed by Senator Cramer to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5274) To prohibit the use of funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule of the Federal Highway Administration relating to greenhouse gas emissions performance measures.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1241 proposed by Senator Cramer to Amendment SA 1092.
